about.title: About me
about.text: I am a web developer with almost 3 years of experience, specializing in modern technologies such as Next.js, Node.js, React, and Python. I have expertise in creating robust and efficient solutions using tools like MongoDB, SQL, Docker, and GitHub Actions to optimize workflows. My experience includes developing applications with React and React Native, as well as automating repetitive processes through RPA in Python. I am also proficient in interface styling with SASS, Styled Components, and Tailwind, always focusing on delivering exceptional user experiences
